page.title: 02Our Daily Life
page.content: Our daily life in 1985 is on monday and until friday every week we are at school. Our school is Catford girls school and we have five lessons a day and we are at school for six hours a day. And we go home around about 3,35 but somtimes we get home work which not many people like it. There is 22 people in my class at school. sometimes we go out for a day with the school or a week camping with the school like l did. My name is Susan Cox and i think that school is all right but l think that it shouid start at 10.00 am not at 8,55 or 9,00.
